meaning_str.bing:
n. 地带；分区；（尤指有别于周围的）区域
v. 将…划作特殊区域；指定…为某项用途的区域；将…分成区（或划成带）
网络. 地区；范围；圈

地带；分区；（尤指有别于周围的）区域
将…划作特殊区域；指定…为某项用途的区域；将…分成区（或划成带）

区；地带；特定区域；（尤指有别于周围的）部分；气候带；生态带；时区；行政区；控制区；防守区（体育用语）；座席区（如剧院内）；（Zone）<塞>佐内（人名）
划分区域；规划地带；将…分区；指定…为某项用途的区域；设定区域限制；标出区域边界

1.en: Across large parts of Japan's disaster zone, nearly a week after a gigantic earthquake and tsunami, aid isn't getting through.
1.cn: 在强地震和海啸发生一周后，日本灾区很大一部分地区仍没有等来救援。

2.en: This should help the wearer to avoid attracting mujahideen rocket fire if she wanders into a war zone on her way back from the boutique.
2.cn: 如果穿着者走出服装店、去某个战区闲逛，这身衣服应该能帮她避免引起穆斯林游击队火箭炮的攻击。

3.en: Meanwhile, the U. S. announced that Libya has "no-fly zone" was extended to Lee near the capital Tripoli, covering the Mediterranean coast.
3.cn: 与此同时，美国宣布已经将利比亚境内“禁飞区”扩大到了利首都的黎波里附近，覆盖了该国地中海沿岸。

0.en: Well, that's why you're here, isn't it? To assist with our repairs? Why else would the head of Starfleet personally come to the edge of the Neutral Zone?
0.cn: 我想这就是您来这里的原因，没错吧? 来帮助我们维修？不然为什么联盟的高官会亲自来到中立区的边缘地带?

1.en: Israel says they're prepared to enforce the no-fly zone.
1.cn: 以色列说他们打算执行禁飞区令。

2.en: In 30 days, the city of New York will be a quarantine zone.
2.cn: 在30天内，纽约将会成为一个隔离区。

3.en: We're at the hotel. It's a free zone. Still. Out of respect.
3.cn: 我们这是在酒店，自由场所。还是注意点吧，出于尊重。

4.en: Don't go into the radiation zone. Don't ask too many questions.
4.cn: 别进入辐射区。别问太多问题。

5.en: We call it the Goldilocks Zone, where liquid water could potentially exist.
5.cn: 我们称之为适居带，那里液态水可能存在。

6.en: Velociraptors are pack hunters. They like to herd the animal into a kill zone.
6.cn: 迅猛龙是群聚猎人，她们会把猎物集中在攻击范围内。

7.en: Did you notice all the people looking at us? Not really. I was in my boogie zone.
7.cn: 你注意到人们看我们的眼神了吗？没怎么注意，我完全沉迷在了舞步中。

8.en: Why at my place? Yeah, Department of Energy said our regular space is kind of a hot zone.
8.cn: 为什么去我那里？能源部说我们原来排练的地方现在是危险区。

9.en: You've been working with Israel. Now there's a no-fly zone. One step forward, two steps back.
9.cn: 你一直在做，结果现在闹出个禁飞区，前进一步，退后两步。

10.en: But you can't leave me with them. We're a team. We're playing a zone. They're gonna triple team me.
10.cn: 但你们不能把我扔给他们，我们是一队的，在打区域联防，他们会以三打一。

11.en: We have families here. I'm not gonna turn this place into some kind of a war zone. You already have.
11.cn: 这里有许多家庭，我不会把这里变成战场的。这里已经是战场了。

12.en: Look, the sooner we end this, the more chance there is of stopping London becoming a complete war zone.
12.cn: 我们越快解决这件事，就越有可能阻止伦敦彻底被战火笼罩。

13.en: You park on the edge of the Neutral Zone, you lock onto Harrison's position, you fire, you kill him and you haul ass.
13.cn: 你把飞船停在中立区边缘，然后锁定哈里森的位置，开火，杀了他就把飞船开回来。

14.en: Thousands of miles from the comfort zone of your shopping malls, who sent your Porge to be blown to bits in our land, or better yet.
14.cn: 和你们那些舒适惬意的商场相距千万里，你们把穷人送到我们的土地上当靶子。

15.en: Look, I know this experiment is a big step outside of your comfort zone. So why don't we take being physical off the table and maybe later on, once we're more settled in, we can revisit it.
15.cn: 我明白这次实验对你来说是迈出舒适圈的一大步。所以我们不如先暂缓发生性关系，留到后面，等彼此适应下来，再提这个话题。

16.en: Said forensics had Margot's hard drive. And told the law enforcement team we'd already cleared the zone I knew her body was in. But still, it was only a matter of time before they'd found the spot.
16.cn: 骗他说鉴证科有玛戈的硬盘。然后告诉执法队我们排除了那片有她尸体的区域的嫌疑。但找到她，只是时间问题。

17.en: We covered about half the search zone already. And, tomorrow is a full day. And the more people came, the, the faster it went. Could I... So, if you have some time tomorrow, we would love the help.
17.cn: 我们大约已经搜索了一半区域。明天还有一整天的搜救工作。来的人越多 工作开展得越快。我能... 如果你明天有时间的话，我们会很感谢你的帮助。

18.en: Sometimes, these confessions are hoaxes but based on his story, we were able to return to the lake site where we discovered trace DNA matching that of Mr. Cartoff in critical areas of the search zone.
18.cn: 有时候，这些认罪行为是恶作剧但是根据他的描述，我们回到我们发现微量DNA的湖的位置，这些DNA被证实与卡托夫先生的相吻合，同时这个湖是在搜寻区的关键位置。
